price: নিশ্চয় তেওঁ নিজ প্ৰতিপালকৰ কিছুমান মহান নিদৰ্শনাৱলী দেখিছিল;
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
